description:
As the creation of their doujinshi enters its peak, Suzuka comes down with high fever. Yuu follows her requests to pick out her underwear, wipe her down, etc., but then she comes at him with an even harder request!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le défi de fanfiction que ma sœur et moi ne pouvons pas perdre
My Sister and I Face a Doujinshi Contest We Can`t Lose
Ore to Imouto no Zettai ni Makerarenai Doujinshi Taiketsu
俺と妹の絶対に負けられない同人誌対決
